title: School Capstone Project
description: A warehouse monitoring system built with a microservices architecture. Python backend services interact with a Vue.js front end to monitor the warehouse environment.

features.title: Login
features.description: Firebase login setup for secure entry. Deployed with Vercel.

features.title: Simulator
features.description: Control the MQTT output from python Eclipse Paho sensors, another python subscriber stores this data in InfluxDB.

features.title: 3D Scene
features.description: View the warehouse sensors in real-time. View inventory data synced with Odoo.

features.title: Admin
features.description: Controls the alert thresholds for environmental sensors.

features.title: Dashboard
features.description: Grafana integrated dashboard view with a Admin thresholds automatically updated.

features.title: Report
features.description: Produces PDF/CSV/EXCEL report files for sensor data over a specified time.

title: Chat-System
description: A Linux system programming project to build a chat server written in ANSI C.

features.title: Project Makefiles
features.description: Modular Makefiles automate the build process for each component for an easy system-wide clean and make process.

features.title: Chat Client
features.description: A terminal-based UI displays messages to the user and allows the user to participate in the chat.

features.title: Chat System
features.description: Up to 10 clients are supported on a multi-threaded server with a graceful disconnect process.

title: Circular-Buffer Histogram
description: A Linux system programming project written in ANSI C. Two data producers write random letters (with two separate methodologies) to shared memory and a data reader displays a histogram in the terminal.

features.title: Project Makefiles
features.description: Makefiles for each of the two producers, reader, and common.

features.title: Semaphore and Shared Memory
features.description: A Semaphore access between the producers to the circular buffer in shared memory

features.title: Histogram
features.description: Every 10 seconds the count for each letter written is summed and displayed.
